truth_repo.1: What's the first thing you would do if you woke up one day as the opposite sex?
truth_repo.3: What was the last thing you texted?
truth_repo.4: What is the most illegal thing you have ever done?
truth_repo.5: Describe the strangest dream you've ever had. Did you like it?
truth_repo.6: Do you have any silly nicknames?
truth_repo.7: What ‘As seen on TV’ product do you secretly want to buy?
truth_repo.8: What was the last R-rated movie you watched?
truth_repo.9: What is something that no one else knows about you?
truth_repo.10: What is something you’ve done to try to be ‘cooler’?
truth_repo.12: What is the most food you’ve eaten in a single sitting?
truth_repo.13: If you could suddenly become invisible, what would you do?
truth_repo.14: What's one thing you would never eat on a first date?
truth_repo.15: What's the best thing to say to your friend that would be the worst thing to say to your crush?
truth_repo.16: What the biggest deal-breaker for you?
truth_repo.17: Do you frequently stalk anyone on social media? Who?
truth_repo.18: Is there anything about your life you would change?
truth_repo.19: What is one disturbing fact I should know about you?
truth_repo.20: If you could plan a class prank knowing you'll never get caught, what would the prank be?

dare_repo.1: Talk in an accent for the next 3 rounds.
dare_repo.2: Do your best impression of a baby being born.
dare_repo.3: Play a song on by slapping your cheeks till someone guesses the song.
dare_repo.4: Make every person in the group laugh, keep going until everyone has laughed.
dare_repo.5: Make up a 30 second opera about a person or people in the group and perform it.
dare_repo.6: Sell a piece trash to someone in the group. Use your best salesmanship.
dare_repo.7: Imitate a celebrity every time you talk for three minutes.
dare_repo.8: Imitate a popular YouTuber until someone can guess the person you are imitating.
dare_repo.9: After the group chooses one word, sing a song and insert that word once into every line of the song.
dare_repo.10: Sing a praise song about a person of the groups choosing.
dare_repo.12: Act like an old lady or an old man.
dare_repo.13: Say “banana” after everything you say until it is your turn again.
dare_repo.14: Act like you do not understand your language until your next turn (come up with your language).
dare_repo.15: Screenshot a picture of your browser history and send it to a random person in your contacts.
dare_repo.16: Describe someone else in the group and others have to guess who it is.
dare_repo.18: Do your best impersonation of Elvis Presley.
dare_repo.19: Dm the tenth friend on your friends list  and tell them all about your day, for no apparent reason.
dare_repo.20: Confess your undying love to another player in the room.
